body_html:
I am also getting this error. My program is in python but I first use CUDA C (thrust and cusp) to do some stuff first and then use pytorch to do some other stuff. My observation is:

  1. If the pytorch model is a CNN, then the error goes away. If I use a GRU then I'd see this error.
  2. If the model is small then the error goes away even if the model is a GRU.
  3. The error occurs only if I transfer the pytorch model to GPU, otherwise it is fine.
  4. There is only 1 GPU on the server, so it is not a multi-GPU problem.
    #4293 In this thread they mention using arrayfire as well. I wonder if it is because the same process uses multiple ways to access the GPU?
